***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Proto-Sino-Tibetan *g-ja + *su per STEDT.
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [t͡ɕasu]
**** Noun[edit] ****
चासु • (cāsu) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐔𑐵𑐳𑐸)
   1. itch
**** Verb[edit] ****
चासु • (cāsu) (Newa Spelling 𑐔𑐵𑐳𑐸)
   1. to be itchy
**** Adjective[edit] ****
चासु • (cāsu)
   1. itchy
